Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 454.
_description: A New Year carol — three cross-rhymed quatrains (abab) plus four-line burden: ‘Make us meri this new yere / Thankyng god with hertely chere’

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
Gabriell bryȝther then the sonneGraciusly grette that mayden
                    fre…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…For the fende she shall vs shyldeSo sayeth bokys in hure
                    story
